channel.title: Hosts on Tanzu Tuesdays - Live Every Tuesday at 1 PM PT
channel.description: Recent content in Hosts on Tanzu Tuesdays - Live Every Tuesday at 1 PM PT

item.title: Bob Brindley
item.description: Bob Brindley travels the world spreading the good word according to Tanzu and Spring to any and all that will hear. He has been a developer advocate for 5 years and still smells terrific.

item.title: Paul Czarkowski
item.description: Paul Czarkowski is a long time practitioner of the dark arts of Devops. Hailing from Australia he moved to Austin Texas to help build and run one of the largest and most successful online games. Now at VMWare, Paul works to improve the Operator experience by taking Cloud Native software development concepts and applying them to Operations to create platforms that reduce toil and improve software delivery.

item.title: tiffany jernigan
item.description: Tiffany is a Developer Advocate for Tanzu at VMWare.
